refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A gtksourceview2.View is a text widget that extends the standard gtk.TextView It improves the gtk.TextView by implementing syntax highlighting and other features typical of a source editor.

refsect1.title: Constructor

listitem.simpara: a gtksourceview2.Buffer or None
a new gtksourceview2.View.

refsect1.para: Creates a new gtksourceview2.View widget displaying the gtksourceview2.Buffer specified by buffer. If buffer is None, a new gtksourceview2.Buffer will be created. One sourcebuffer can be shared among many widgets.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_auto_indent

listitem.simpara: True if auto indentation is enabled, False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_auto_indent() method returns whether auto indentation of text is enabled.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_draw_spaces

listitem.simpara: One of gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_SPACE, gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_TAB gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_NEWLINE or gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_ALL.

refsect2.para: The get_draw_spaces() method returns one of the flags specifying if and how spaces should be displayed for this view.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_gutter

listitem.simpara: the gtksourceview2.Gutter.

refsect2.para: The get_gutter() method returns the gtksourceview2.Gutter object associated with window_type for view. Only gtk.TEXT_WINDOW_LEFT and gtk.TEXT_WINDOW_RIGHT are supported, respectively corresponding to the left and right gutter. The line numbers and mark category icons are rendered in the gutter corresponding to gtk.TEXT_WINDOW_LEFT.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_highlight_current_line

listitem.simpara: True if the current line is highlighted, False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_highlight_current_line() method returns whether the current line is highlighted.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_indent_on_tab

listitem.simpara: True if the selection is indented when tab is pressed. False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_indent_on_tab() method returns whether when the tab key is pressed the current selection should get indented instead of replaced with the \t character.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_indent_width

listitem.simpara: the indent width.

refsect2.para: The get_indent_width() method returns the number of spaces to use for each step of indent. See gtksourceview2.View.set_indent_width() for details.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_insert_spaces_instead_of_tabs

listitem.simpara: True if spaces are inserted instead of tabs. False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_insert_spaces_instead_of_tabs() method returns whether when inserting a tabulator character it should be replaced by a group of space characters.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_mark_category_background

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Color if found, or None if not found.

refsect2.para: The get_marker_category_pixbuf() method gets the pixbuf which is associated with the given category.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_mark_category_pixbuf

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Pixbuf if found, or None if not found.

refsect2.para: The get_marker_category_pixbuf() method gets the pixbuf which is associated with the given category.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_mark_category_priority

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Pixbuf if found, or None if not found.

refsect2.para: The get_mark_category_priority() method gets the priority which is associated with the given category.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_right_margin_position

listitem.simpara: the position of the right margin.

refsect2.para: The get_right_margin_position() method gets the position of the right margin.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_show_line_marks

listitem.simpara: True if the line marks are displayed. False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_show_line_marks() method returns whether line marks are displayed beside the text.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_show_line_numbers

listitem.simpara: True if the line numbers are displayed. False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_show_line_numbers() method returns whether line numbers are displayed beside the text.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_show_right_margin

listitem.simpara: True if the right margin is displayed. False otherwise.

refsect2.para: The get_show_right_margin() method returns whether a right margin is displayed.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_smart_home_end

listitem.simpara: a GtkSourceSmartHomeEndType value specifying how the cursor will move when HOME and END keys are pressed.

refsect2.para: The get_smart_home_end() method returns a value specifying how the cursor will move when HOME and END keys are pressed.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.get_tab_width

listitem.simpara: the width of tab.

refsect2.para: The get_tab_width() method returns the width of tabulation in characters.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_auto_indent

listitem.simpara: if True auto indentation of text is enabled.

refsect2.para: The set_auto_indent() method sets whether to enable auto indentation.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_draw_spaces

listitem.simpara: one of gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_SPACE, gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_TAB gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_NEWLINE or gtksourceview2.DRAW_SPACES_ALL, specifing how white spaces should be displayed.

refsect2.para: The set_draw_spaces() method set if and how the spaces should be visualized. Specifying flags as 0 will disable display of spaces.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_highlight_current_line

listitem.simpara: if True the current line is highlighted.

refsect2.para: The set_highlight_current_line() method sets whether to highlight the current line.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_indent_on_tab

listitem.simpara: if True indent a block when tab is pressed.

refsect2.para: The set_indent_on_tab() method sets when the tab key is pressed and there is a selection, the selected text is indented of one level instead of being replaced with the \t characters. Shift+Tab unindents the selection.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_indent_width

listitem.simpara: indent width in characters.

refsect2.para: The set_indent_width() method sets the number of spaces to use for each step of indent. If width is -1, the value of the GtkSourceView::tab-width property will be used.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_insert_spaces_instead_of_tabs

listitem.simpara: if True insert spaces instead of tabs.

refsect2.para: The set_insert_spaces_instead_of_tabs() method sets whether any tabulator character inserted is replaced by a group of space characters.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_background

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Color or None.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_priority() method sets given background color for mark category. If color is None, the background color is unset.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_icon_from_icon_name

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
the themed icon name or None.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_icon_from_icon_name() method sets the icon to be used for category to the named theme item name. If name is None, the icon is unset.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_icon_from_pixbuf

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Pixbuf or None.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_icon_from_pixbuf() method sets the icon to be used for category to pixbuf. If pixbuf is None, the icon is unset.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_icon_from_stock

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
the stock id or None.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_icon_from_stock() method sets the icon to be used for category to the stock item stock_id. If stock_id is None, the icon is unset.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_pixbuf

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a gtk.gdk.Pixbuf or None.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_priority() method associates a given pixbuf with a given category. If pixbuf is None, the pixbuf is unset.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_priority

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
the priority for the category.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_priority() method Set the priority for the given mark category. When there are multiple marks on the same line, marks of categories with higher priorities will be drawn on top.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_tooltip_func

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a function or None.
user data which will be passed to func.

refsect2.para: The set_mark_category_tooltip_func() method sets a func used to set tooltip on marks from the given mark category. If func is None and markup_func is None then tooltips will not be shown for marks from category. If markup_func is not None markup_func is going to be used instead of func.
Where mark is the gtksourceview2.Mark to use, user_data is the data passed to set_mark_category_tooltip_func().

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_tooltip_markup_func

listitem.simpara: a marker category.
a function or None.
user data which will be passed to func.

refsect2.para: See gtksourceview2.View.set_mark_category_tooltip_func for more information.
Where mark is the gtksourceview2.Mark to use, user_data is the data passed to set_mark_category_tooltip_func().

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_right_margin_position

listitem.simpara: The width in characters where to position the right margin.

refsect2.para: The set_right_margin_position() method sets the position of the right margin.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_show_line_marks

listitem.simpara: if True line marks will be displayed beside the text.

refsect2.para: The set_show_line_marks() method sets whether line marks should be displayed.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_show_line_numbers

listitem.simpara: if True line numbers will be displayed beside the text.

refsect2.para: The set_show_line_numbers() method sets whether line numbers should be displayed.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_show_right_margin

listitem.simpara: if True line numbers will be displayed beside the text.

refsect2.para: The set_show_right_margin() method sets whether to show a right margin.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_smart_home_end

listitem.simpara: the desired behavior among GtkSourceSmartHomeEndType.

refsect2.para: The set_smart_home_end() method sets the desired movement of the cursor when HOME and END keys are pressed.

refsect2.title: gtksourceview2.View.set_tab_width

listitem.simpara: width of tab in characters.

refsect2.para: The set_tab_width() method sets the width of tabulation in characters.

refsect2.title: The "line-number-activated" gtksourceview2.View Signal

listitem.simpara: the sourceview that received the signal
a gtk.TextIter.
the gtk.gdk.Event that activated the event.
the first user parameter (if any) specified with the connect() method
additional user parameters (if any)

refsect2.para: The "line-number-activated" signal is emitted when a line mark has been activated (for instance when there was a button press in the line marks gutter). You can use iter to determine on which line the activation took place.

refsect2.title: The "redo" gtksourceview2.View Signal

listitem.simpara: the sourceview that received the signal
the first user parameter (if any) specified with the connect() method
additional user parameters (if any)

refsect2.para: The "redo" signal is emitted when an action has been redone.

refsect2.title: The "undo" gtksourceview2.View Signal

listitem.simpara: the sourceview that received the signal
the first user parameter (if any) specified with the connect() method
additional user parameters (if any)

refsect2.para: The "undo" signal is emitted when an action has been undone.
